root.name: Apples to Apples
root.description: OverviewApples to Apples is a downloadable party game developed by ImaginEngine and published by THQ on December 7, 2011 for the Xbox 360 (via Xbox Live Arcade) and PlayStation 3 (via PlayStation Network). Based on the original Apples to Applesâ„¢ card game, party style fun is just as ripe for the picking ins video version.How to PlayJust like the board game, players with red cards each select the one they feel is most like the green card, played by the player known as the judge. The person whose card is picked by the judge wins that round. Players alternate being the judge so that everyone gets a turn! Play online with up to five friends in Classic Mode or one of two variations -- Baked Apples, and Crab Apples.Special FeaturesPlayers may also choose from one of 26 amusing Apple Avatars, enjoy environments like Space or Carnival Apples, and collect the coveted Golden Apple Cards serve to mix up the game, adding to the fun! With over 1000 combined red and green cards, Apples to Apples provides endless hours of amusement for players of all ages.
